titleStmt.title: Monasticon anglicanum, or, The history of the ancient abbies, and other monasteries, hospitals, cathedral and collegiate churches, in England and Wales with divers French, Irish, and Scotch monasteries formerly relating to England / collected, and published in Latin, by Sir William Dugdale, Knight ..., in three volums; and now epitomized in English, page by page; with sculptures of the several religious habits.

Dodsworth, Roger, 1585-1654.
Stevens, John, d. 1726. History of the antient abbeys, monasteries, hospitals, cathedral and collegiate churches.

notesStmt.note: An abridged translation, by James Wright of the Latin work in 3 volumes, originally published under the joint authorship of Roger Dodsworth and Sir William Dugdale, London, 1655-73. A
Reproduction of original in Bristol Public Library, Bristol, England.
